page.title: 06A Day in a Schoolgirl's Life
page.content: My alarm rings full blast at 7.45 a.m. and almost{wakes}half the household. I get up just after my mum. At first I am all dozy and nearly fall asleep eating my usual{breakfast,}but when I have washed I feel bright and fresh. When I am ready I set off on my bicycle for{school}where we go indoors to our classrooms. We take our hymn books into assembly. We have Mathematics until playtime after which I usually write a story and have a French lesson before at last it is{lunchtime. After lunch we do general subjects including Physical Education. I{return}home and after doing my homework I help Mum to cook the dinner. I watch a little television and climb into{bed}exhausted.
